verses.verse: Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> The gate<WH8179> of the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> that looks<WH6437> toward the east<WH6921> shall be shut<WH5462> the six<WH8337> working<WH4639> days;<WH3117> but on the sabbath<WH7676> it shall be opened,<WH6605> and in the day<WH3117> of the new<WH2320> moon<WH2320> it shall be opened.<WH6605>

And the prince<WH5387> shall enter<WH935> by the way<WH1870> of the porch<WH197> of that gate<WH8179> without,<WH2351> and shall stand<WH5975> by the post<WH4201> of the gate,<WH8179> and the priests<WH3548> shall prepare<WH3559> his burnt<WH5930> offering and his peace<WH8002> offerings, and he shall worship<WH7812> at<WH5921> the threshold<WH4670> of the gate:<WH8179> then he shall go<WH3318> forth;<WH3318> but the gate<WH8179> shall not be shut<WH5462> until<WH5704> the evening.<WH6153>

Likewise the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> shall worship<WH7812> at the door<WH6607> of this<WH1931> gate<WH8179> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> in the sabbaths<WH7676> and in the new<WH2320> moons.<WH2320>

And the burnt<WH5930> offering that the prince<WH5387> shall offer<WH7126> to the LORD<WH3068> in the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117> shall be six<WH8337> lambs<WH3532> without<WH8549> blemish,<WH8549> and a ram<WH352> without<WH8549> blemish.<WH8549>

And the meat offering<WH4503> shall be an ephah<WH374> for a ram,<WH352> and the meat offering<WH4503> for the lambs<WH3532> as he shall be able<WH4991> <WH3027> to give,<WH4991> and an hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081> to an ephah.<WH374>

And in the day<WH3117> of the new<WH2320> moon<WH2320> it shall be a young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullock<WH6499> without<WH8549> blemish,<WH8549> and six<WH8337> lambs,<WH3532> and a ram:<WH352> they shall be without<WH8549> blemish.<WH8549>

And he shall prepare<WH3559> a meat offering,<WH4503> an ephah<WH374> for a bullock,<WH6499> and an ephah<WH374> for a ram,<WH352> and for the lambs<WH3532> according as his hand<WH3027> shall attain<WH5381> to, and an hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081> to an ephah.<WH374>
And when the prince<WH5387> shall enter,<WH935> he shall go<WH935> in by the way<WH1870> of the porch<WH197> of that gate,<WH8179> and he shall go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> by the way<WH1870> thereof.

But when the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> shall come<WH935> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> in the solemn<WH4150> feasts,<WH4150> he that enters<WH935> in by the way<WH1870> of the north<WH6828> gate<WH8179> to worship<WH7812> shall go<WH3318> out by the way<WH1870> of the south<WH5045> gate;<WH8179> and he that enters<WH935> by the way<WH1870> of the south<WH5045> gate<WH8179> shall go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> by the way<WH1870> of the north<WH6828> gate:<WH8179> he shall not return<WH7725> by the way<WH1870> of the gate<WH8179> whereby<WH834> he came<WH935> in, but shall go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> over<WH5226> against<WH5227> it.
And the prince<WH5387> in the middle<WH8432> of them, when they go<WH935> in, shall go<WH935> in; and when they go<WH3318> forth,<WH3318> shall go<WH3318> forth.<WH3318>

And in the feasts<WH2282> and in the solemnities<WH4150> the meat offering<WH4503> shall be an ephah<WH374> to a bullock,<WH6499> and an ephah<WH374> to a ram,<WH352> and to the lambs<WH3532> as he is able<WH4991> <WH3027> to give,<WH4991> and an hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081> to an ephah.<WH374>

Now<WH3588> when the prince<WH5387> shall prepare<WH3559> a voluntary<WH5071> burnt<WH5930> offering or peace<WH8002> offerings voluntarily<WH5071> to the LORD,<WH3068> one shall then open<WH6605> him the gate<WH8179> that looks<WH6437> toward the east,<WH6921> and he shall prepare<WH3559> his burnt<WH5930> offering and his peace<WH8002> offerings, as he did<WH6213> on the sabbath<WH7676> day:<WH3117> then he shall go<WH3318> forth;<WH3318> and after<WH310> his going<WH3318> forth<WH3318> one shall shut<WH5462> the gate.<WH8179>

You shall daily<WH3117> prepare<WH3559> a burnt<WH5930> offering to the LORD<WH3068> of a lamb<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without<WH8549> blemish:<WH8549> you shall prepare<WH3559> it every morning.<WH1242>

And you shall prepare<WH3559> a meat offering<WH4503> for it every morning,<WH1242> the sixth<WH8345> part of an ephah,<WH374> and the third<WH7992> part of an hin<WH1969> of oil,<WH8081> to temper<WH7450> with the fine flour;<WH5560> a meat offering<WH4503> continually<WH8548> by a perpetual<WH5769> ordinance<WH2708> to the LORD.<WH3068>
Thus shall they prepare<WH3559> the lamb,<WH3532> and the meat offering,<WH4503> and the oil,<WH8081> every morning<WH1242> for a continual<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering.

Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> If<WH3588> the prince<WH5387> give<WH5414> a gift<WH4979> to any<WH376> of his sons,<WH1121> the inheritance<WH5159> thereof shall be his sons';<WH1121> it shall be their possession<WH272> by inheritance.<WH5159>

But if<WH3588> he give<WH5414> a gift<WH4979> of his inheritance<WH5159> to one<WH259> of his servants,<WH5650> then it shall be his to the year<WH8141> of liberty;<WH1865> after it shall return<WH7725> to the prince:<WH5387> but his inheritance<WH5159> shall be his sons'<WH1121> for them.

Moreover the prince<WH5387> shall not take<WH3947> of the people's<WH5971> inheritance<WH5159> by oppression,<WH3238> to thrust<WH3238> them out of their possession;<WH272> but he shall give his sons<WH1121> inheritance<WH5157> out of his own possession:<WH272> that my people<WH5971> be not scattered<WH6327> every man<WH376> from his possession.<WH272>

After he brought<WH935> me through the entry,<WH3996> which<WH834> was at<WH5921> the side of the gate,<WH8179> into<WH413> the holy<WH6944> chambers<WH3957> of the priests,<WH3548> which looked<WH6437> toward the north:<WH6828> and, behold,<WH2009> there<WH8033> was a place<WH4725> on the two sides<WH3411> westward.<WH3220>

Then said<WH559> he to me, This<WH2088> is the place<WH4725> where<WH834> <WH8033> the priests<WH3548> shall boil<WH1310> the trespass<WH817> offering and the sin<WH2403> offering, where<WH834> they shall bake<WH644> the meat offering;<WH4503> that they bear<WH3318> them not out into<WH413> the utter<WH2435> court,<WH2691> to sanctify<WH6942> the people.<WH5971>

Then he brought<WH3318> me forth<WH3318> into<WH413> the utter<WH2435> court,<WH2691> and caused me to pass<WH5674> by the four<WH702> corners<WH4742> of the court;<WH2691> and, behold,<WH2009> in every corner<WH4742> of the court<WH2691> there was a court.<WH2691>

In the four<WH702> corners<WH4742> of the court<WH2691> there were courts<WH2691> joined<WH7000> of forty<WH705> cubits long<WH753> and thirty<WH7970> broad:<WH7341> these four<WH702> corners<WH7106> were of one<WH259> measure.<WH4060>

And there was a row<WH2905> of building round<WH5439> about in them, round<WH5439> about them four,<WH702> and it was made<WH6213> with boiling<WH4018> places under<WH8478> the rows<WH2918> round<WH5439> about.

Then said<WH559> he to me, These<WH428> are the places<WH1004> of them that boil,<WH1310> where<WH834> <WH833> the ministers<WH8334> of the house<WH1004> shall boil<WH1310> the sacrifice<WH2077> of the people.<WH5971>
